**Feature Description**
Describe the feature or improvement you want to see in keonOS.

**Motivation**
Explain why this feature would be useful or important.

**Technical Details (optional)**
Implementation ideas, dependencies, or requirements if you have them.

**Additional Notes**
Any extra info, links, or context that could help understand or implement the feature.
